Name: Japanese Juniper Bonsai (5 Years)
Short description: Stunning Japanese Juniper, perfect for beginners. 5 years old, 25cm height.
Description:
The Japanese Juniper (Juniperus procumbens) is one of the most popular bonsai species, known for its hardiness and beautiful green foliage. This 5-year-old specimen has been carefully trained and is perfect for beginners.

**Features:**
- Age: 5 years
- Height: 25cm
- Species: Juniperus procumbens
- Difficulty: Beginner-friendly
- Location: Outdoor bonsai
- Pot included: Traditional ceramic pot

**Care Instructions:**
- Water: Keep soil slightly moist, water when top soil is dry
- Light: Full sun to partial shade
- Temperature: Hardy, can withstand frost
- Pruning: Prune new growth regularly to maintain shape

**Shipping:**
- EU only (live plant shipping restrictions)
- Arrives with care instructions
- Securely packaged for safe delivery

This beautiful juniper makes an excellent first bonsai or addition to any collection.

Name: Chinese Ficus Bonsai (7 Years)
Short description: Beautiful indoor Ficus with aerial roots. 7 years old, 30cm height.
Description:
The Chinese Ficus (Ficus retusa) is the perfect indoor bonsai, featuring beautiful aerial roots and glossy dark green leaves. This 7-year-old tree has been professionally trained.

**Features:**
- Age: 7 years
- Height: 30cm
- Species: Ficus retusa
- Difficulty: Beginner-friendly
- Location: Indoor bonsai
- Pot included: Glazed ceramic pot

**Care Instructions:**
- Water: Water when soil surface dries out
- Light: Bright indirect light
- Temperature: 15-25°C, avoid drafts
- Humidity: Mist leaves regularly

**Why Ficus?**
Perfect for beginners because it's very forgiving and tolerates some neglect. Grows quickly and develops beautiful aerial roots over time.

**Shipping:**
- EU only
- Includes species-specific care guide
- Gift wrapping available

- Age: 10 years

- Species: Acer palmatum

- Location: Outdoor bonsai

- Spring: Fresh red leaves
- Summer: Deep burgundy foliage
- Autumn: Brilliant orange and red colors
- Winter: Elegant branch structure

**Care Requirements:**
- Water: Keep soil evenly moist, never dry out
- Light: Partial shade (protect from hot afternoon sun)

Name: Premium Concave Branch Cutter
Short description: Professional concave cutter for clean cuts. Japanese steel, 200mm.
Description:
The concave branch cutter is the most important tool in bonsai. This professional model creates the perfect hollow cut for fast healing.

**Specifications:**
- Length: 200mm
- Material: Japanese high-carbon steel
- Blade: Hand-sharpened
- Handles: Non-slip rubber grips
- Finish: Black oxide coating

**Why Concave Cutters?**
Regular pruners leave flush cuts that create ugly scars. Concave cutters create a hollow that heals over naturally, leaving minimal trace.

**Professional Quality:**
- Precision ground blades
- Perfect alignment
- Smooth action
- Long-lasting edge

**Made in Japan**

**Shipping:** Worldwide

Name: Premium Akadama Soil (10L)
Short description: High-quality Japanese akadama clay. Essential for proper drainage and root health.
Description:
Akadama is a naturally occurring volcanic clay from Japan, considered the gold standard for bonsai soil.

**Features:**
- Origin: Japan
- Grade: Hard quality
- Size: Medium grain (3-6mm)
- Volume: 10 liters
- Pre-sifted and ready to use

**Benefits:**
- Excellent water retention
- Perfect drainage
- Optimal aeration
- Retains nutrients
- pH neutral

**Usage:**
- Use alone or mix 50/50 with pumice
- Suitable for all species
- Replace every 2-3 years as it breaks down

**Professional Choice:**
Used by Japanese bonsai masters for centuries.

**Note:** Turns reddish-brown when dry (watering indicator)

**Shipping:** EU only (heavy item)

Name: Organic Bonsai Fertilizer (500ml)
Short description: Balanced NPK organic liquid fertilizer. For all bonsai species during growing season.
Description:
Premium organic liquid fertilizer specially formulated for bonsai trees. Provides balanced nutrition throughout the growing season.

**NPK Ratio:** 5-5-5 (Balanced)

**Features:**
- 100% organic ingredients
- Liquid formula for easy application
- Safe for all species
- Won't burn roots
- Includes trace minerals

**Application:**
- Dilute 10ml per 1L of water
- Apply every 2 weeks (March-October)
- Reduce to monthly in winter
- Don't fertilize sick trees

**Volume:** 500ml (makes 50 liters)

Name: Humidity Tray - 30cm
Short description: Ceramic humidity tray for indoor bonsai. Increases humidity, decorative.
Description:
Attractive ceramic humidity tray helps maintain ideal humidity levels for indoor bonsai.

**Specifications:**
- Size: 30cm diameter
- Color: Natural terracotta
- Material: Glazed ceramic
- Grid included: Plastic mesh

**How It Works:**
1. Fill tray with water
2. Place grid on top
3. Set bonsai pot on grid
4. Water evaporates, increasing humidity
5. Pot stays dry (roots don't sit in water)

**Benefits:**
- Prevents dry air damage
- Healthier foliage
- Better for tropical species
- Attractive display
- Easy maintenance

**Perfect For:**
- Ficus
- Carmona (Fukien Tea)
- Chinese Elm (indoors)
- Tropical species
- Dry indoor environments

**Care:**
- Refill water as needed
- Clean occasionally

**Shipping:** Worldwide
